replies.msg:
I am not sure how many foreigners here.
What I’m gonna to tell you is there is a terribly increasing of dead bodies found around HongKong.
It located everywhere. Over the sea, inside the forests or some cases of “jump off the building” in the city(Or BEING JUMPED OFF).
The most terrible thing is that some people told that they saw some police in some districts during midnight, and dead bodies was then found in the exact places next day.
I can’t conclude anything now but our bro n sis are trying to find out every clues on this issue. I do believe there are number of protesters were murdered and then acted as an accidental death. I hope the truth can come out ASAP but I really cannot accept this at all.
GOD bless HK.
